1101.a: International Centre for Theoretical Physics, Trieste.

24510.b: Selected lectures presented at two meetings, both held at the international centre for theoretical physics. trieste; the ictp college on theoretical and computational plasma physics 22 march to 9 april 1977 and the third international ('kiev') conference ON PLASMA THEORY 5 TO 9 APRIL 1977 ORGANIZED BY THE ACADEMY OF SCIENCES OF THE UKRAINIAN SSR AND THE ACADEMY OF SICENCES OF THE USSR.
